chunks.text:
# Extendicare Policy Manual: Infection Prevention and Control## INDEX: IPC5-P10### SECTION: Outbreak Management- **EFFECTIVE DATE:** February 18, 2025
- **REVIEWED DATE:** February 11, 2025
- **APPROVED BY:** Chief Medical Officer
- **MODIFIED DATE:** May 30, 2025----## POLICYHomes will be proactive in the identification and prevention of outbreaks.## STANDARDIn the event of an outbreak, a home-specific outbreak management plan will be in place and will be implemented as expeditiously as possible to interrupt further transmission of the etiological agent.- Outbreaks will be reported to the Regional Director for the home, Extendicare Head Office, and health authority, as required.
- All homes will have an annually reviewed home-specific outbreak plan in place to guide infection prevention and control practices and interventions in the event of an active outbreak.
- All homes will follow the provincial/regional outbreak management protocols as applicable.## PROCEDURE1. IPC5-O10.01 - Outbreak Management## EDUCATION1. IPC5-P10-E1 - Outbreak Guide

2. IPC5-P10-E2 - Laundry Guidelines

3. IPC5-P10-E3 - Tray Service Guidelines

4. IPC5-P10-E4 - Outbreak Sign## TOOLS1. IPC5-P10-T1 - Home Specific Outbreak Plan

2. IPC5-P10-T2 - Initial Meeting Minutes - Outbreak Management Team
